bibl.title: A Second-Century AD Letter of Introduction in the Washington State University Collection.
bibl.note: Part of a small collection acquired in the early 1970s by the Manuscript-Archives Division at WSU (Washington State University). - Recto: list of names and professions. - Verso: letter by a certain Ptolemaios to his father Tryphon. Arsinoite nome (?), second century AD.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Wash. State Univ. Inv. 5 recto; 5 verso
Blumell Lincoln H., A Second-Century AD Letter of Introduction in the Washington State University Collection.

Part of a small collection acquired in the early 1970s by the Manuscript-Archives Division at WSU (Washington State University). - Recto: list of names and professions. - Verso: letter by a certain Ptolemaios to his father Tryphon. Arsinoite nome (?), second century AD.
